typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MTART as string,
		GEWEI as string,
		VOLUM as decimal(10,0),
		VOLEH as string,
		RAUBE as string,
		ETIFO as string,
		EAN11 as string,
		LAENG as decimal(10,0),
		BREIT as decimal(10,0),
		HOEHE as decimal(10,0),
		MEABM as string,
		MATNR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		MAKTG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MAKT
MAKT, MARA join(MAKT@MATNR == MARA@MATNR,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> jnrMARA
jnrMARA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ItemSku as string,
		ItemDescription as string,
		DescriptiveLabelText as string,
		ItemIndustryGroup as string,
		ItemGroupID as string,
		BaseUOMID as string,
		PurchaseOrderUOMID as string,
		SizeDimension as string,
		ItemWeightGross as decimal(13,0),
		ItemWeightNet as decimal(13,0),
		ItemTypeId as string,
		WeightUomId as string,
		ItemVolume as decimal(13,0),
		ItemVolumeUomId as string,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId as string,
		TransporationGroupTypeId as string,
		GradeLabelText as string,
		InformationLabelText as string,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber as string,
		GlobalTradeItemNumberCategory as string,
		ItemLength as decimal(13,0),
		ItemWidth as decimal(13,0),
		ItemHeight as decimal(13,0),
		LwhUomId as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MARA@MATNR,
		ItemDescription = MAKTX,
		DescriptiveLabelText = MAKTG,
		ItemTypeId = MTART,
		WeightUomId = GEWEI,
		ItemVolume = VOLUM,
		ItemVolumeUomId = VOLEH,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId = RAUBE,
		InformationLabelText = ETIFO,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber = EAN11,
		ItemLength = LAENG,
		ItemWidth = BREIT,
		ItemHeight = HOEHE,
		LwhUomId = MEABM
	)) ~> ItemNew
